1{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall #-}
2
3-- | Getters for parameter.
4
5module Koshucode.Baala.Syntax.Para.Get
6  ( -- * Named parameter
7    paraGet, paraGetOpt, paraGetList, paraGetSwitch,
8    -- * Positional parameter
9    paraGetPos, paraGetFst, paraGetSnd, paraGetTrd,
10    paraGetRest, paraGetRRest,
11  ) where
12
13import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Base                  as B
14import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Syntax.Para.Para      as S
15import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Base.Message          as Msg
16
17
18-- ----------------------  Named
19
20-- | Named parageter.
21paraGet :: (Ord n) => S.Para n a -> n -> B.Ab [a]
22paraGet p n =
23    case S.paraLookup n p of
24      Just [vs]  -> Right vs
25      Just _     -> Msg.adlib "multiple-occurence parameter"
26      Nothing    -> Msg.adlib "no named parameter"
27
28-- | Named parameter with default content.
29paraGetOpt :: (Ord n) => [a] -> S.Para n a -> n -> B.Ab [a]
30paraGetOpt def p n =
31    case S.paraLookup n p of
32      Just [vs]  -> Right vs
33      Just _     -> Msg.adlib "multiple-occurence parameter"
34      Nothing    -> Right def
35
36-- | Multiple-occurence parameter.
37paraGetList :: (Ord n) => S.Para n a -> n -> B.Ab [[a]]
38paraGetList p n =
39    case S.paraLookup n p of
40      Just vss   -> Right vss
41      Nothing    -> Msg.adlib "no named parameter"
42
43-- | S.Parameter as switch, just given or not.
44paraGetSwitch :: (Ord n) => S.Para n a -> n -> B.Ab Bool
45paraGetSwitch p n =
46    case S.paraLookup n p of
47      Just _     -> Right True
48      Nothing    -> Right False
49
50
51-- ----------------------  Positional
52
53-- | Whole positional parameter list.
54paraGetPos :: S.Para n a -> B.Ab [a]
55
56-- | First positional parameter.
57paraGetFst :: S.Para n a -> B.Ab a
58
59-- | Second positional parameter.
60paraGetSnd :: S.Para n a -> B.Ab a
61
62-- | Third positional parameter.
63paraGetTrd :: S.Para n a -> B.Ab a
64
65-- | Positional parameter list but first element.
66paraGetRest :: S.Para n a -> B.Ab [a]
67
68-- | Positional parameter list but first and second element.
69paraGetRRest :: S.Para n a -> B.Ab [a]
70
71paraGetPos    = Right . S.paraPos
72paraGetFst    = listFst   . S.paraPos
73paraGetSnd    = listSnd   . S.paraPos
74paraGetTrd    = listTrd   . S.paraPos
75paraGetRest   = listRest  . S.paraPos
76paraGetRRest  = listRRest . S.paraPos
77
78listFst :: [a] -> B.Ab a
79listFst (x:_)      = Right x
80listFst _          = Msg.adlib "no first parameter"
81
82listSnd :: [a] -> B.Ab a
83listSnd (_:x:_)    = Right x
84listSnd _          = Msg.adlib "no second parameter"
85
86listTrd :: [a] -> B.Ab a
87listTrd (_:_:x:_)  = Right x
88listTrd _          = Msg.adlib "no third parameter"
89
90listRest :: [a] -> B.Ab [a]
91listRest (_:xs)    = Right xs
92listRest _         = Msg.adlib "no rest parameter"
93
94listRRest :: [a] -> B.Ab [a]
95listRRest (_:_:xs) = Right xs
96listRRest _        = Msg.adlib "no rest parameter"
97
